metadata.dc:title: Evasione domestica
metadata.dc:creator: Nicola Magri
metadata.dc:subject: Effort
Escape
Quarantine
metadata.dcterms:abstract: This memory is provided by Nicola Magri. He is an illustrator and he wants to show the effort of immagination to figure a world inside the walls of our house during the quarantine.
metadata.dc:description: L'illustrazione racconta la voglia di uscire di casa, sapendo di non poterlo fare, immaginando un' estensione verde aldil√† delle mura domestiche. The illustration tells the desire to leave the house, knowing that it cannot be done, imagining a green extension beyond the home.
